Hero.title: Expert Healthcare Services
Hero.subtitle: Compassionate, patient-centered care for you and your family

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare solutions tailored to your needs

login.signInToAccount: Sign in to your account to continue
login.transformJourneyDesc: Join thousands of people who have transformed their lives with our personalized nutrition and wellness programs.
login.feature1Desc: Customized nutrition plans based on your preferences and goals
login.feature2Desc: Get guidance from certified nutritionists and dietitians
login.feature3Desc: Monitor your health metrics and achievements
login.testimonialQuote: This platform changed my life. I've lost 20 pounds and feel more energetic than ever!

signup.patientTypeDesc: I want to receive nutrition guidance
signup.startJourneyDesc: Take the first step towards a healthier lifestyle with our comprehensive wellness programs.
signup.feature1Desc: Get nutrition plans tailored specifically to your needs
signup.feature3Desc: Monitor your health journey with detailed analytics
signup.testimonialQuote: Best decision I made was joining this program. My health has improved dramatically!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.successMessage: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If it doesn't appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.helpDesc: Having trouble accessing your account? Our support team is ready to assist you.
forgotPassword.help1Desc: Sometimes reset emails can end up in spam or junk folders
forgotPassword.help2Desc: Still having issues? Reach out to our support team

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account
resetPassword.securityDesc: Choose a strong password that you don't use for other accounts.
resetPassword.security1Desc: Combine letters, numbers, and special characters
resetPassword.security2Desc: We will never ask for your password via email or phone

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.subtitle: Update your password to keep your account secure
changePassword.successMessage: Your password has been changed successfully
changePassword.tipsDesc: Follow these guidelines to create a strong, secure password.
changePassword.tip1Desc: Don't reuse passwords from other accounts
changePassword.tip2Desc: Longer passwords are harder to crack
changePassword.tip3Desc: Add variety to make your password stronger
